Title: Representative Brody
Writer: Howard Gordon (developed for american television by), Alex Gansa (developed for american television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Henry Bromell
Actors: Claire Danes, Damian Lewis, Morena Baccarin, David Harewood
Plot: Walker's Washington contact is identified by Carrie and Saul, but the target is protected via diplomatic immunity. Meanwhile, political bigwigs approach Brody about running for a disgraced congressman's seat.
